1874.verse: لَعَمْرُكَ|By your life|94|111|9820$إِنَّهُمْ|indeed, they|103|137|106$لَفِى|were in|68|102|1513$سَكْرَتِهِمْ|their intoxication,|136|170|9821$يَعْمَهُونَ|wandering blindly.|138|155|128$

1875.verse: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ|So, seized them|126|211|4598$ٱلصَّيْحَةُ|the awful cry|108|278|8594$مُشْرِقِينَ|at sunrise.|100|185|9822$

1876.verse: فَجَعَلْنَا|And We made|111|121|9823$عَـٰلِيَهَا|its highest (part)|133|153|8664$سَافِلَهَا|its lowest,|89|109|8665$وَأَمْطَرْنَا|and We rained|115|135|6582$عَلَيْهِمْ|upon them|90|110|22$حِجَارَةً|stones|86|96|7241$مِّن|of|50|314|53$سِجِّيلٍ|baked clay.|96|360|8666$

1880.verse: وَإِن كَانَ|And were|104|134|9827$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(the) companions|136|195|409$ٱلْأَيْكَةِ|(of) the wood|112|171|9828$لَظَـٰلِمِينَ|surely wrongdoers.|145|175|9829$

1881.verse: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا|So We took retribution|170|193|6763$مِنْهُمْ|from them,|92|138|730$وَإِنَّهُمَا|and indeed, they both|167|213|9830$لَبِإِمَامٍ|(were) on a highway|157|180|9831$مُّبِينٍ|clear.|66|66|3469$

1882.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|116|640$كَذَّبَ|denied|67|86|5487$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(the) companions|136|154|409$ٱلْحِجْرِ|(of) the Rocky Tract,|162|180|9832$ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ|the Messengers.|129|138|2247$

1887.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|80|46$خَلَقْنَا|We created|97|112|7029$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|130|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth|111|126|2280$وَمَا|and whatever|111|126|46$بَيْنَهُمَآ|(is) between them|142|150|3978$إِلَّا|except|65|81|86$بِٱلْحَقِّ‌ۗ|in truth.|78|110|692$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|130|713$ٱلسَّاعَةَ|the Hour|87|119|9836$لَأَتِيَةٌ‌ۖ|(is) surely coming.|142|174|9837$فَٱصْفَحِ|So overlook|97|113|9838$ٱلصَّفْحَ|(with) forgiveness|140|364|9839$ٱلْجَمِيلَ|gracious.|88|312|9840$

1890.verse: لَا|(Do) not|76|89|30$تَمُدَّنَّ|extend|69|96|9847$عَيْنَيْكَ|your eyes|85|112|9848$إِلَىٰ|towards|73|100|118$مَا|what|53|80|262$مَتَّعْنَا|We have bestowed|147|174|9849$بِهِۦٓ|with it|62|75|204$أَزْوَٲجًا|(to) categories|120|126|2084$مِّنْهُمْ|of them|71|83|730$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|116|25$تَحْزَنْ|grieve|78|90|7592$عَلَيْهِمْ|over them.|92|104|22$وَٱخْفِضْ|And lower|101|113|9850$جَنَاحَكَ|your wing|88|94|9851$لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|to the believers.|129|129|923$

1873.verse: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."

1874.verse: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly.

1875.verse: So the shriek seized them at sunrise.

1876.verse: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay.

1877.verse: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.

1878.verse: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road.

1879.verse: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.

1880.verse: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers.

1881.verse: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway.

1882.verse: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers.

1883.verse: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away.

1884.verse: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure.

1885.verse: But the shriek seized them at early morning.

1886.verse: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn.

1887.verse: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness.

1888.verse: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.

1889.verse: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an.

1890.verse: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers

1891.verse: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -

1892.verse: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators
